title: EP 48: Butter on a Burn
description: Put butter on that burn. Don't put your purse on the floor. The wives tales, sayings, superstitions & home remedies - the things we heard from our mamas, papas and grandparents are all part of our folk heritage. In this episode, we hear some, we look at why they're important, we do some fact checking, and Hana and Leila explore why we believe some of the things we believe.
itunes:title: Butter on a Burn
itunes:subtitle: Our wives tales, superstitions & folk sayings - do we believe them?
author: hangout@thestoop.org (Hana Baba and Leila Day)
itunes:author: Hana Baba and Leila Day
